name: Combo Mania
description:
Every second you lose 5 health but every time you kill an enemy you gain 15. 

This game was made as a part of Mini Jam 86. Your objective is to get to the end and beat the boss that has 4 different attacks. Can you beat the game? I'm warning you it's not an easy game. 
Enjoy the game! If you have any feedback let me know in the comments!

---------------------Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

----------------------
